name: iyccenter
title: YouTube Control Center
description: YouTube Control Center provides a set of useful tools for YouTube.com
author: InBasic

preferences.name: context
preferences.title: [UI] Right click on the toolbar button

preferences.name: middle
preferences.title: [UI] Middle click on the toolbar button:

preferences.name: header
preferences.title: [Player] Suggested playback quality:

preferences.name: sidebar
preferences.title: [Page] Display 'video suggestions' sidebar:

preferences.name: discussion
preferences.title: [Page] Display 'video comments' pane:

preferences.name: views
preferences.title: [Page] Display 'video views info' pane:

preferences.name: actions
preferences.title: [Page] Display 'action buttons' pane ('like', 'dislike', 'share', ... buttons)

preferences.name: details
preferences.title: [Page] Display 'details' pane (published info, buy video, ...):

preferences.name: moreDetails
preferences.title: [Page] Automatically 'Show more' on the video description:

preferences.name: annotations
preferences.title: Player] Show video annotations on player:

preferences.name: quality
preferences.title: [Player] Suggested playback quality:

preferences.name: volume
preferences.title: [Player] Default video playback volume:

preferences.name: autoplay
preferences.title: [Player] Autoplay video when player loads ((tab refreshing is required):
preferences.description: False value conflicts with 'automatically play next video from playlist'

preferences.name: autobuffer
preferences.title: [Player] Autobuffer video even if player is not playing:

preferences.name: playlist
preferences.title: [Player] Automatically play next video from playlist (Up Next):
preferences.description: False value conflicts with 'autoplay video when player loads' and 'display related videos when playback of the video ends'

preferences.name: rel
preferences.title: [Player] Display related videos when playback of the current video ends:
preferences.description: False value conflicts with 'automatically play next video from playlist'

preferences.name: controls
preferences.title: [Player] Show video controls on player (deprecated):

preferences.name: autohide
preferences.title: [Player] Autohide video controls after a video begins playing:

preferences.name: autofshow
preferences.title: [Player] Display video controls even in fullscreen mode:

preferences.name: loop
preferences.title: [Player] Play videos again and again (loop mode) (tab refreshing is required):

preferences.name: loopDelay
preferences.title: [Player] Delay between plays for loop mode (in seconds):

preferences.name: disablekb
preferences.title: [Player] Disable keyboard controls (spacebar and arrow keys) on player:

preferences.name: fs
preferences.title: Display fullscreen button on player:

preferences.name: theme
preferences.title: [Player] Display player controls (like a 'play' button or volume control) within a dark or light control bar (deprecated):

preferences.name: color
preferences.title: [Player] Color of video progressbar:

preferences.name: onePlayer
preferences.title: [Misc.] Pause all YouTube players when the current player is playing:

preferences.name: skipads
preferences.title: [Misc.] Skip advertisements in player:

preferences.name: forceVisible
preferences.title: [Misc.] Always try to keep the toolbar button visible:

preferences.name: killOnExit
preferences.title: [Misc.] Clear tracks (logs) history on exit:

preferences.name: silent
preferences.title: [Misc.] Do not display desktop notifications:

preferences.name: clearLog
preferences.label: Clear
preferences.title: [Misc.] Clear tracks (logs) history:

preferences.name: reset
preferences.label: Reset
preferences.title: [Misc.] Reset all settings to the defaults
